title: key fragments
body: i don't understand how i have been waiting a little more than a week to get the 2 key fragments i need to open one of my many chests and y'all give 1 key fragment for my sportsman behaviour. i'm honor lvl 4 and i barely get any key fragments when its supposed to increase the chance of giving me a key fragments the higher my honor lvl is.

replies.body: Gaining honor level doesn't increase the change or rate of hextech keys, just enables the drop of capsules.  You're still limited to 12 keys roughly every 28 days, per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Keep playing, you'll get one with time!

i guess i didn't read the info right then but still every time i get the notification of getting a key fragments its always one at a time  this month i had about 6 key fragments in total which i find confusing since i never got any penalties in my life. I tried looking up on the hextech crafting guide but did not find any answer. I also play a lot of league, i play for hours everyday so i don't think that if i keep playing i will get one :(. sorry if i seem impatient but i'm just really excited because i got a nice legacy skin in an orb during the arcade event and the honor capsule i got so far only gave me champion shards :(
You only get 12 a month, but you can get more per week if you play a lot. I've always got 2 keys
